# <span data-ttu-id="215ac-103">Microsoft Edge - ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-103">Microsoft Edge - Policies</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="215ac-104">最新バージョンの Microsoft Edge には、次のポリシーが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-104">The latest version of Microsoft Edge includes the following policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-105">これらのポリシーを使用して、組織内での Microsoft Edge の動作方法を構成することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-105">You can use these policies to configure how Microsoft Edge runs in your organization.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-106">Microsoft Edge の更新方法とタイミングを制御するために使用される追加のポリシー セットについては、「[Microsoft Edge update policy reference (Microsoft Edge の更新ポリシー リファレンス)](microsoft-edge-update-policies.md)」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-106">For information about an additional set of policies used to control how and when Microsoft Edge is updated, check out [Microsoft Edge update policy reference](microsoft-edge-update-policies.md).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-107">Microsoft Edge に推奨されるセキュリティ構成のベースライン設定については、[Microsoft Security Compliance Toolkit](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=55319) をダウンロードすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-107">You can download the [Microsoft Security Compliance Toolkit](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=55319) for the recommended security configuration baseline settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-108">詳細については、「[Microsoft セキュリティ ベースライン ブログ](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-security-baselines/bg-p/Microsoft-Security-Baselines)」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-108">For more information see the [Microsoft Security Baselines Blog](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-security-baselines/bg-p/Microsoft-Security-Baselines).</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-109">この記事は Microsoft Edge version 77 以降に適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-109">This article applies to Microsoft Edge version 77 or later.</span></span>

|[<span data-ttu-id="215ac-675">TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-675">TranslateEnabled</span></span>](#translateenabled)|<span data-ttu-id="215ac-676">翻訳を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-676">Enable Translate</span></span>|

|[<span data-ttu-id="215ac-685">UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-685">UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>](#userfeedbackallowed)|<span data-ttu-id="215ac-686">ユーザー フィードバックを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-686">Allow user feedback</span></span>|

  ## <span data-ttu-id="215ac-707">Application Guard の設定ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-707">Application Guard settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-708">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-708">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-709">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-709">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-710">Application Guard コンテナー プロキシ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-710">Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-711">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-711">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-712">Windows での 84 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-712">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-713">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-713">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-714">Microsoft Edge Application Guard のプロキシの設定を構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-714">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="215ac-715">このポリシーを有効にすると、Microsoft Edge Application Guard はプロキシ構成のその他のソースを無視します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-715">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard ignores other sources of proxy configurations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-716">このポリシーを構成しない場合、Microsoft Edge Application Guard はホストのプロキシ構成を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-716">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard uses the proxy configuration of the host.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-717">このポリシーは、Application Guard (ホスト) 以外での Microsoft Edge のプロキシ構成には影響しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-717">This policy does not affect the proxy configuration of Microsoft Edge outside of Application Guard (on the host).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-718">ProxyMode フィールドでは、Microsoft Edge Application Guard で使用するプロキシ サーバーを指定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-718">The ProxyMode field lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-719">ProxyPacUrl フィールドはプロキシ .pac ファイルへの URL です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-719">The ProxyPacUrl field is a URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-720">ProxyServer フィールドはプロキシ サーバーの URL です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-720">The ProxyServer field is a URL for the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-721">'ProxyMode' として 'direct' の値を選択した場合、その他のフィールドはすべて無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-721">If you choose the 'direct' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-722">"ProxyMode" として "auto_detect" の値を選択した場合、その他のフィールドはすべて無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-722">If you choose the 'auto_detect' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-723">'ProxyMode' として 'fixed_server' の値を選択した場合、'ProxyServer' フィールドが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-723">If you choose the 'fixed_servers' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyServer' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-724">'ProxyMode' として 'pac_script' の値を選択した場合、'ProxyPacUrl' フィールドが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-724">If you choose the 'pac_script' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyPacUrl' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-725">デュアル プロキシを介した Application Guard トラフィックの識別の詳細については、[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653)を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-725">For more information about identifying Application Guard traffic via dual proxy, visit [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-726">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-726">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-727">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-727">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-728">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-728">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-729">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-729">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-730">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-730">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-731">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-731">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-732">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-732">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-733">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-733">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-734">GP 固有の名前: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-734">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-735">GP 名: Application Guard コンテナー プロキシ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-735">GP name: Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-736">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-736">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-737">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-737">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-738">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-738">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-739">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-739">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-740">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-740">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-741">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-741">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-742">値の名前: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-742">Value Name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-743">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-743">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-744">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-744">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {
  "ProxyMode": "direct", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-745">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-745">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="215ac-746">キャストに関するポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-746">Cast policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-747">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-747">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-748">EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-748">EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-749">Google Cast を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-749">Enable Google Cast</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-750">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-750">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-751">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-751">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-752">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-752">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-753">このポリシーを有効にすると、Google Cast が有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-753">Enable this policy to enable Google Cast.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-754">ユーザーは、[アプリ] メニュー、[ページ コンテキスト] メニュー、キャスト対応 Web サイトのメディア コントロール、(表示されていれば) [キャスト] ツール バーのアイコンから起動することができるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-754">Users will be able to launch it from the app menu, page context menus, media controls on Cast-enabled websites, and (if shown) the Cast toolbar icon.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-755">このポリシーを無効にすると、Google Cast が無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-755">Disable this policy to disable Google Cast.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-756">既定では、Google Cast は有効になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-756">By default, Google Cast is enabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-757">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-757">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-758">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-758">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-759">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-759">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-760">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-760">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-761">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-761">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-762">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-762">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-763">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-763">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-764">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-764">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-765">GP 固有の名前: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-765">GP unique name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-766">GP 名: Google Cast を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-766">GP name: Enable Google Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-767">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/キャスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-767">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-768">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-768">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-769">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-769">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-770">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-770">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-771">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-771">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-772">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-772">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-773">値の名前: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-773">Value Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-774">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-774">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-775">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-775">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-776">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-776">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-777">基本設定キーの名前: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-777">Preference Key Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-778">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-778">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-779">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-779">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-780">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-780">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-781">ツール バーにキャスト アイコンを表示する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-781">Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-782">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-782">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-783">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-783">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-784">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-784">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-785">このポリシーを true に設定すると、ツール バーや [オーバーフロー] メニューに [キャスト] ツール バーのアイコンが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-785">Set this policy to true to show the Cast toolbar icon on the toolbar or the overflow menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-786">ユーザーが削除することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-786">Users won't be able to remove it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-787">このポリシーを構成していない場合、またはこのポリシーを無効にしている場合、ユーザーは [コンテキスト] メニューを使用してアイコンをピン留めしたり、削除したりすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-787">If you don't configure this policy or if you disable it, users can pin or remove the icon by using its contextual menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-788">また、[EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) ポリシーを false に設定している場合、このポリシーは無視され、ツール バーのアイコンは表示されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-788">If you've also set the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy to false, then this policy is ignored, and the toolbar icon isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-789">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-789">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-790">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-790">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-791">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-791">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-792">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-792">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-793">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-793">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-794">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-794">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-795">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-795">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-796">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-796">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-797">GP 固有の名前: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-797">GP unique name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-798">GP 名: ツール バーにキャスト アイコンを表示する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-798">GP name: Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-799">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/キャスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-799">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-800">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-800">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-801">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-801">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-802">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-802">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-803">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-803">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-804">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-804">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-805">値の名前: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-805">Value Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-806">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-806">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-807">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-807">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-808">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-808">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-809">基本設定キーの名前: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-809">Preference Key Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-810">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-810">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-811">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-811">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="215ac-812">コンテンツの設定に関するポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-812">Content settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-813">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-813">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-814">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-814">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-815">これらのサイトのクライアント証明書を自動的に選択する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-815">Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-816">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-816">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-817">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-817">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-818">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-818">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-819">サイトがクライアント証明書を要求した場合、Microsoft Edge が自動的にクライアント証明書を選択するサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-819">Specify a list of sites, based on URL patterns, for which Microsoft Edge should automatically select a client certificate, if the site requests one.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-820">値は文字列化された JSON 辞書の配列である必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-820">The value must be an array of stringified JSON dictionaries.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-821">各辞書は { "パターン": "$URL_PATTERN", "フィルター" : $FILTER } という形式にする必要があり、ここでの $URL_PATTERN はコンテンツの設定パターンです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-821">Each dictionary must have the form { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, where $URL_PATTERN is a content setting pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-822">$FILTER は、ブラウザーが自動的に選択するクライアント証明書を制限します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-822">$FILTER restricts from which client certificates the browser will automatically select.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-823">フィルターとは無関係に、サーバーの証明書要求に一致する証明書のみが選択されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-823">Independent of the filter, only certificates will be selected that match the server's certificate request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-824">たとえば、$FILTER が { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } } の形式を持つ場合、CommonName $ISSUER_CN を持つ証明書が発行したクライアント証明書のみが選択されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-824">For example, if $FILTER has the form { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, additionally only client certificates are selected that are issued by a certificate with the CommonName $ISSUER_CN.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-825">$FILTER に "ISSUER" と "SUBJECT" セクションが含まれている場合、両方の条件を満たしたクライアント証明書でなければ選択されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-825">If $FILTER contains an "ISSUER" and a "SUBJECT" section, a client certificate must satisfy both conditions to be selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-826">$FILTER が組織 ("O") を指定した場合、選択される証明書には、指定された値に一致する組織が少なくとも 1 つ必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-826">If $FILTER specifies an organization ("O"), a certificate must have at least one organization which matches the specified value to be selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-827">$FILTER が組織単位 ("OU") を指定した場合、選択される証明書には、指定された値に一致する組織単位が少なくとも 1 つ必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-827">If $FILTER specifies an organization unit ("OU"), a certificate must have at least one organization unit which matches the specified value to be selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-828">$FILTER が空の辞書 {} である場合、クライアント証明書の選択が追加で制限されることはありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-828">If $FILTER is the empty dictionary {}, the selection of client certificates is not additionally restricted.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-829">このポリシーを構成していない場合、自動選択はどのサイトに対しても行われません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-829">If you don't configure this policy, auto-selection isn't done for any site.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-830">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-830">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-831">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-831">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-832">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-832">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-833">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-833">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-834">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-834">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-835">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-835">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-836">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-836">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-837">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-837">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-838">GP 固有の名前: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-838">GP unique name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-839">GP 名: これらのサイトのクライアント証明書を自動的に選択する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-839">GP name: Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-840">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-840">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-841">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-841">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-842">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-842">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-843">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-843">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-844">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-844">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-845">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-845">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-846">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-846">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-847">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-847">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-848">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-848">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls\1 = {"pattern":"https://www.contoso.com","filter":{"ISSUER":{"CN":"certificate issuer name", "L": "certificate issuer location", "O": "certificate issuer org", "OU": "certificate issuer org unit"}, "SUBJECT":{"CN":"certificate subject name", "L": "certificate subject location", "O": "certificate subject org", "OU": "certificate subject org unit"}}}

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-849">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-849">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-850">基本設定キーの名前: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-850">Preference Key Name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-851">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-851">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{"pattern":"https://www.contoso.com","filter":{"ISSUER":{"CN":"certificate issuer name", "L": "certificate issuer location", "O": "certificate issuer org", "OU": "certificate issuer org unit"}, "SUBJECT":{"CN":"certificate subject name", "L": "certificate subject location", "O": "certificate subject org", "OU": "certificate subject org unit"}}}</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-852">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-852">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-853">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-853">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-854">特定のサイトでの Cookie を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-854">Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-855">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-855">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-856">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-856">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-857">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-857">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-858">Cookie の設定を許可するサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-858">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-859">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-859">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-860">詳細については、[CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) と [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) ポリシーを参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-860">See the [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-861">これらの 3 つのポリシー間で、競合する URL パターンを設定することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-861">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-862">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-862">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="215ac-863">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-863">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-864">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-864">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-865">終了時に cookie を削除されないようにするには、 [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) ポリシーを構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-865">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-866">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-866">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-867">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-867">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-868">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-868">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-869">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-869">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-870">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-870">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-871">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-871">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-872">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-872">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-873">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-873">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-874">GP 固有の名前: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-874">GP unique name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-875">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの Cookie を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-875">GP name: Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-876">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-876">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-877">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-877">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-878">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-878">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-879">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-879">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-880">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-880">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-881">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-881">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-882">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-882">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-883">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-883">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-884">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-884">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-885">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-885">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-886">基本設定キーの名前: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-886">Preference Key Name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-887">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-887">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-888">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-888">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-889">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-889">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-890">特定のサイトでの Cookie のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-890">Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-891">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-891">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-892">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-892">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-893">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-893">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-894">Cookie を設定することができないサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-894">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-895">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-895">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-896">詳細については、[CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) と [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) ポリシーを参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-896">See the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-897">これらの 3 つのポリシー間で、競合する URL パターンを設定することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-897">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="215ac-898">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-898">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-899">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-899">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-900">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-900">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-901">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-901">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-902">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-902">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-903">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-903">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-904">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-904">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-905">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-905">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-906">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-906">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-907">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-907">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-908">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-908">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-909">GP 固有の名前: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-909">GP unique name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-910">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの Cookie のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-910">GP name: Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-911">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-911">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-912">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-912">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-913">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-913">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-914">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-914">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-915">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-915">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-916">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-916">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-917">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-917">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-918">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-918">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-919">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-919">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-920">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-920">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-921">基本設定キーの名前: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-921">Preference Key Name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-922">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-922">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-923">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-923">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-924">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-924">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-925">特定の Web サイトからの Cookie を現在のセッションに制限する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-925">Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-926">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-926">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-927">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-927">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-928">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-928">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-929">定義した URL パターンに一致する Web サイトが作成した Cookie は、セッション終了時 (ウィンドウが閉じたとき) に削除されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-929">Cookies created by websites that match a URL pattern you define are deleted when the session ends (when the window closes).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-930">パターンに一致しない Web サイトが作成した Cookie は、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) によって制御されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-930">Cookies created by websites that don't match the pattern are controlled by the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or by the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-931">これは、このポリシーを構成していない場合の既定動作でもあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-931">This is also the default behavior if you don't configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-932">Microsoft Edge がバックグラウンド モードで実行されている場合、最後のウィンドウが閉じたときにセッションが閉じない可能性があります。これは、ウィンドウが閉じたときに Cookie がクリアされないことを意味します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-932">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-933">Microsoft Edge がバックグラウンド モードで動作するときの構成については、[BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) ポリシーを参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-933">See the [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-934">また、[CookieAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) と [CookieBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) ポリシーを使用して、Cookie を作成できる Web サイトを制御することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-934">You can also use the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) policies to control which websites can create cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-935">これらの 3 つのポリシー間で、競合する URL パターンを設定することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-935">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-936">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-936">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-937">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-937">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="215ac-938">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-938">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-939">[RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) ポリシーを設定して以前のセッションから URL を復元する場合、このポリシーは無視され、それらのサイトについての Cookie は永続的に保管されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-939">If you set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to restore URLs from previous sessions, this policy is ignored, and cookies are stored permanently for those sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-940">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-940">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-941">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-941">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-942">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-942">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-943">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-943">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-944">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-944">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-945">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-945">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-946">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-946">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-947">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-947">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-948">GP 固有の名前: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-948">GP unique name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-949">GP 名: 特定の Web サイトからの Cookie を現在のセッションに制限する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-949">GP name: Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-950">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-950">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-951">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-951">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-952">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-952">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-953">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-953">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-954">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-954">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-955">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-955">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-956">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-956">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-957">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-957">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-958">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-958">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-959">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-959">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-960">基本設定キーの名前: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-960">Preference Key Name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-961">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-961">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-962">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-962">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-963">DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-963">DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-964">Cookie を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-964">Configure cookies</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-965">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-965">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-966">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-966">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-967">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-967">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-968">Web サイトがユーザーのデバイス上で Cookie を作成できるかどうかを制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-968">Control whether websites can create cookies on the user's device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-969">このポリシーは、全体に対して適用するか、全く適用しないかのどちらかになります。すべての Web サイトが Cookie を作成できるようにするか、どの Web サイトにもクッキーを作成させないようにするかを選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-969">This policy is all or nothing - you can let all websites create cookies, or no websites create cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-970">このポリシーを使用して、特定の Web サイトからの Cookie を有効にすることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-970">You can't use this policy to enable cookies from specific websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-971">ポリシーを "SessionOnly" に設定すると、セッションが閉じるときに Cookie がクリアされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-971">Set the policy to 'SessionOnly' to clear cookies when the session closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-972">Microsoft Edge がバックグラウンド モードで実行されている場合、最後のウィンドウが閉じたときにセッションが閉じない可能性があります。これは、ウィンドウが閉じたときに Cookie がクリアされないことを意味します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-972">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-973">Microsoft Edge がバックグラウンド モードで動作するときの構成については、[BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) ポリシーを参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-973">See [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-974">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定の “AllowCookies" が使用され、ユーザーはこの設定を Microsoft Edge の設定で変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-974">If you don't configure this policy, the default 'AllowCookies' is used, and users can change this setting in Microsoft Edge Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-975">(ユーザーがこの設定を変更できないようにしたい場合は、ポリシーを設定します。)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-975">(If you don't want users to be able to change this setting, set the policy.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-976">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-976">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-977">AllowCookies (1) = すべてのサイトで Cookie を作成できるようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-977">AllowCookies (1) = Let all sites create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-978">BlockCookies (2) = どのサイトにも Cookie を作成させないようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-978">BlockCookies (2) = Don't let any site create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-979">SessionOnly (4) = セッションの継続中に Cookie を保持する ([SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) に記載されているものを除く)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-979">SessionOnly (4) = Keep cookies for the duration of the session, except ones listed in [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-980">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-980">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-981">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-981">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-982">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-982">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-983">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-983">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-984">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-984">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-985">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-985">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-986">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-986">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-987">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-987">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-988">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-988">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-989">GP 固有の名前: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-989">GP unique name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-990">GP 名: Cookie を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-990">GP name: Configure cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-991">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-991">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-992">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-992">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-993">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-993">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-994">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-994">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-995">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-995">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-996">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-996">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-997">値の名前: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-997">Value Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-998">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-998">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-999">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-999">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1000">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1000">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1001">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1001">Preference Key Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1002">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1002">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1003">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1003">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1004">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1004">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1005">既定の位置情報の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1005">Default geolocation setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1006">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1006">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1007">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1007">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1008">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1008">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1009">Web サイトがユーザーの物理的な場所を追跡できるかどうかを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1009">Set whether websites can track users' physical locations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1010">追跡を既定で許可したり ('AllowGeolocation')、既定で拒否したり ('BlockGeolocation')、Web サイトがユーザーの位置情報を要求するたびにユーザーに確認を求めたり ('AskGeolocation') することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1010">You can allow tracking by default ('AllowGeolocation'), deny it by default ('BlockGeolocation'), or ask the user each time a website requests their location ('AskGeolocation').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1011">このポリシーを構成しない場合、'AskGeolocation' が使用され、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1011">If you don't configure this policy, 'AskGeolocation' is used and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1012">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1012">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1013">AllowGeolocation (1) = サイトがユーザーの物理的な場所を追跡できるようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1013">AllowGeolocation (1) = Allow sites to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1014">BlockGeolocation (2) = サイトがユーザーの物理的な場所を追跡できないようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1014">BlockGeolocation (2) = Don't allow any site to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1015">AskGeolocation (3) = サイトがユーザーの物理的な場所を追跡する場合は、必ず確認する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1015">AskGeolocation (3) = Ask whenever a site wants to track users' physical location</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1016">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1016">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1017">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1017">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1018">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1018">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1019">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1019">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1020">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1020">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1021">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1021">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1022">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1022">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1023">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1023">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1024">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1024">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1025">GP 固有の名前: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1025">GP unique name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1026">GP 名: 既定の位置情報の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1026">GP name: Default geolocation setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1027">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1027">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1028">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1028">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1029">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1029">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1030">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1030">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1031">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1031">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1032">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1032">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1033">値の名前: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1033">Value Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1034">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1034">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1035">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1035">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1036">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1036">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1037">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1037">Preference Key Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1038">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1038">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1039">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1039">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1040">DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1040">DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1041">既定の画像の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1041">Default images setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1042">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1042">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1043">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1043">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1044">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1044">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1045">Web サイトが画像を表示できるどうかを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1045">Set whether websites can display images.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1046">すべてのサイトで画像を許可する ('AllowImages') か、すべてのサイトで画像をブロックする ('BlockImages') かを選択することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1046">You can allow images on all sites ('AllowImages') or block them on all sites ('BlockImages').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1047">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定で画像が許可され、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1047">If you don't configure this policy, images are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1048">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1048">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1049">AllowImages (1) = すべてのサイトに対してすべての画像の表示を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1049">AllowImages (1) = Allow all sites to show all images</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1050">BlockImages (2) = すべてのサイトに対して画像の表示を許可しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1050">BlockImages (2) = Don't allow any site to show images</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1051">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1051">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1052">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1052">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1053">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1053">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1054">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1054">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1055">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1055">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1056">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1056">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1057">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1057">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1058">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1058">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1059">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1059">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1060">GP 固有の名前: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1060">GP unique name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1061">GP 名: 既定の画像の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1061">GP name: Default images setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1062">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1062">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1063">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1063">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1064">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1064">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1065">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1065">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1066">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1066">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1067">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1067">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1068">値の名前: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1068">Value Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1069">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1069">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1070">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1070">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1071">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1071">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1072">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1072">Preference Key Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1073">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1073">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1074">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1074">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1075">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1075">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1076">安全でないコンテンツの例外の使用を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1076">Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1077">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1077">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1078">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1078">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1079">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1079">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1080">特定のサイトの混在したコンテンツを許可するために、ユーザーが例外を追加できるかどうかを設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1080">Allows you to set whether users can add exceptions to allow mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1081">特定の URL パターンに対するこのポリシーは、[InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) と [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) ポリシーを使用して、上書きすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1081">This policy can be overridden for specific URL patterns using the [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) and [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1082">このポリシーが設定されていない場合、ユーザーは、ブロック可能な混在したコンテンツを許可するための例外を追加し、任意でブロック可能な混在したコンテンツの自動アップグレードを無効にすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1082">If this policy isn't set, users will be allowed to add exceptions to allow blockable mixed content and disable autoupgrades for optionally blockable mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1083">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1083">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1084">BlockInsecureContent (2) = 混在したコンテンツの読み込みを、どのサイトにも、許可しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1084">BlockInsecureContent (2) = Do not allow any site to load mixed content</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1085">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = ユーザーが例外を追加して、混在したコンテンツを許可できるようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1085">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = Allow users to add exceptions to allow mixed content</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1086">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1086">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1087">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1087">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1088">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1088">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1089">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1089">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1090">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1090">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1091">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1091">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1092">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1092">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1093">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1093">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1094">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1094">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1095">GP 固有の名前: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1095">GP unique name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1096">GP 名: 安全でないコンテンツの例外の使用を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1096">GP name: Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1097">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1097">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1098">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1098">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1099">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1099">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1100">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1100">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1101">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1101">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1102">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1102">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1103">値の名前: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1103">Value Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1104">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1104">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1105">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1105">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1106">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1106">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1107">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1107">Preference Key Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1108">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1108">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1109">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1109">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1110">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1110">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1111">既定の JavaScript の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1111">Default JavaScript setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1112">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1112">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1113">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1113">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>
