  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1114">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1114">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1115">Web サイトが JavaScript を実行できるどうかを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1115">Set whether websites can run JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1116">すべてのサイトで使用できるようにする (' AllowJavaScript ') か、すべてのサイトに対してブロックすることができます (' BlockJavaScript ')。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1116">You can allow it for all sites ('AllowJavaScript') or block it for all sites ('BlockJavaScript').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1117">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定ですべてのサイトでの JavaScript の実行が許可され、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1117">If you don't configure this policy, all sites can run JavaScript by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1118">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1118">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1119">AllowJavaScript (1) = すべてのサイトで JavaScript の実行を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1119">AllowJavaScript (1) = Allow all sites to run JavaScript</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1120">BlockJavaScript (2) = すべてのサイトで JavaScript の実行を許可しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1120">BlockJavaScript (2) = Don't allow any site to run JavaScript</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1121">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1121">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1122">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1122">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1123">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1123">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1124">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1124">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1125">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1125">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1126">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1126">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1127">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1127">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1128">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1128">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1129">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1129">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1130">GP 固有の名前: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1130">GP unique name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1131">GP 名: 既定の JavaScript の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1131">GP name: Default JavaScript setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1132">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1132">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1133">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1133">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1134">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1134">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1135">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1135">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1136">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1136">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1137">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1137">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1138">値の名前: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1138">Value Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1139">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1139">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1140">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1140">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1141">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1141">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1142">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1142">Preference Key Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1143">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1143">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1144">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1144">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1145">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1145">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1146">既定の通知の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1146">Default notification setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1147">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1147">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1148">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1148">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1149">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1149">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1150">Web サイトがデスクトップ通知を表示できるどうかを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1150">Set whether websites can display desktop notifications.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1151">デスクトップ通知を既定で許可したり ('AllowNotifications')、既定で拒否したり ('BlockNotifications')、Web サイトが通知を表示するたびにユーザーに確認を求めたり ('AskNotifications') することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1151">You can allow them by default ('AllowNotifications'), deny them by default ('BlockNotifications'), or have the user be asked each time a website wants to show a notification ('AskNotifications').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1152">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定で通知が許可され、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1152">If you don't configure this policy, notifications are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1153">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1153">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1154">AllowNotifications (1) = サイトがデスクトップ通知を表示できるようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1154">AllowNotifications (1) = Allow sites to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1155">BlockNotifications (2) = サイトがデスクトップ通知を表示できないようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1155">BlockNotifications (2) = Don't allow any site to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1156">AskNotifications (3) = サイトがデスクトップ通知を表示するたびに確認を求める</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1156">AskNotifications (3) = Ask every time a site wants to show desktop notifications</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1157">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1157">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1158">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1158">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1159">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1159">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1160">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1160">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1161">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1161">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1162">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1162">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1163">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1163">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1164">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1164">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1165">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1165">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1166">GP 固有の名前: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1166">GP unique name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1167">GP 名: 既定の通知の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1167">GP name: Default notification setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1168">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1168">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1169">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1169">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1170">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1170">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1171">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1171">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1172">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1172">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1173">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1173">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1174">値の名前: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1174">Value Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1175">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1175">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1176">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1176">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1177">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1177">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1178">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1178">Preference Key Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1179">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1179">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1180">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1180">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1181">DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1181">DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1182">既定の Adobe Flash の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1182">Default Adobe Flash setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1183">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1183">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1184">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1184">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1185">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1185">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1186">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) または [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) の対象になっていない Web サイトが、自動的に Adobe Flash プラグインを実行できるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1186">Determines whether websites that aren't covered by [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) or [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) can automatically run the Adobe Flash plug-in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1187">"BlockPlugins" を選択してすべてのサイトで Adobe Flash をブロックするか、または "ClickToPlay" を選択して Adobe Flash を実行できるようにするかを選択することができますが、それを開始するにはユーザーがプレースホルダーをクリックする必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1187">You can select 'BlockPlugins' to block Adobe Flash on all sites, or you can select 'ClickToPlay' to let Adobe Flash run but require the user to click the placeholder to start it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1188">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) と [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) ポリシーは、いつでも "DefaultPluginsSetting" よりも優先されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1188">In any case, the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) policies take precedence over 'DefaultPluginsSetting'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1189">自動再生は、[ PrauginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) ポリシーに明示的にリストされているドメインにのみ許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1189">Automatic playback is only allowed for domains explicitly listed in the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1190">すべてのサイトの自動再生を有効にする場合は、http://\* と https://\* をこの一覧に追加します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1190">If you want to enable automatic playback for all sites, consider adding http://\* and https://\* to this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1191">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーはこの設定を手動で変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1191">If you don't configure this policy, the user can change this setting manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1192">以前の "1" オプションはすべてを許可する設定になっていましたが、この機能は [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) ポリシーでのみ処理されるようになりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1192">The former '1' option set allow-all, but this functionality is now only handled by the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1193">"1" を使用している既存のポリシーは、"ClickToPlay" モードで動作します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1193">Existing policies using '1' will operate in 'ClickToPlay' mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1194">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1194">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1195">BlockPlugins (2) = Adobe Flash プラグインをブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1195">BlockPlugins (2) = Block the Adobe Flash plugin</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1196">ClickToPlay (3) = クリックして再生する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1196">ClickToPlay (3) = Click to play</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1197">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1197">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1198">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1198">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1199">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1199">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1200">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1200">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1201">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1201">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1202">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1202">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1203">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1203">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1204">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1204">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1205">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1205">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1206">GP 固有の名前: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1206">GP unique name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1207">GP 名: 既定の Adobe Flash の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1207">GP name: Default Adobe Flash setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1208">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1208">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1209">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1209">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1210">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1210">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1211">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1211">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1212">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1212">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1213">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1213">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1214">値の名前: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1214">Value Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1215">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1215">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1216">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1216">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1217">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1217">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1218">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1218">Preference Key Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1219">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1219">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1220">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1220">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1221">DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1221">DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1222">既定のポップアップ ウィンドウの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1222">Default pop-up window setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1223">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1223">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1224">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1224">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1225">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1225">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1226">Web サイトがポップアップ ウィンドウを表示できるかどうかを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1226">Set whether websites can show pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1227">すべての Web サイトでポップアップ ウィンドウを許可する ('AllowPopups') か、すべてのサイトでポップアップ ウィンドウをブロックする ('BlockPopups') かを選択することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1227">You can allow them on all websites ('AllowPopups') or block them on all sites ('BlockPopups').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1228">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定でポップアップ ウィンドウがブロックされ、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1228">If you don't configure this policy, pop-up windows are blocked by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1229">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1229">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1230">AllowPopups (1) = すべてのサイトに対してポップアップの表示を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1230">AllowPopups (1) = Allow all sites to show pop-ups</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1231">BlockPopups (2) = すべてのサイトに対してポップアップの表示を許可しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1231">BlockPopups (2) = Do not allow any site to show popups</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1232">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1232">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1233">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1233">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1234">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1234">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1235">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1235">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1236">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1236">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1237">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1237">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1238">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1238">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1239">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1239">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1240">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1240">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1241">GP 固有の名前: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1241">GP unique name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1242">GP 名: 既定のポップアップ ウィンドウの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1242">GP name: Default pop-up window setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1243">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1243">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1244">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1244">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1245">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1245">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1246">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1246">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1247">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1247">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1248">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1248">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1249">値の名前: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1249">Value Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1250">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1250">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1251">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1251">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1252">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1252">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1253">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1253">Preference Key Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1254">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1254">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1255">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1255">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1256">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1256">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1257">Web Bluetooth API の使用を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1257">Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1258">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1258">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1259">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1259">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1260">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1260">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1261">Web サイトが近くの Bluetooth デバイスにアクセスできるかどうかを制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1261">Control whether websites can access nearby Bluetooth devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1262">アクセスを完全にブロックするか、サイトが Bluetooth デバイスにアクセスするときに毎回ユーザーに確認を求めるように設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1262">You can completely block access or require the site to ask the user each time it wants to access a Bluetooth device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1263">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定値 ('AskWebBluetooth'、つまりユーザーが毎回確認を求められることを意味します) が使用され、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1263">If you don't configure this policy, the default value ('AskWebBluetooth', meaning users are asked each time) is used and users can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1264">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1264">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1265">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = Web Bluetooth API を介して Bluetooth デバイスへのアクセスを要求するサイトを許可しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1265">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to Bluetooth devices via the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1266">AskWebBluetooth (3) = 近くの Bluetooth デバイスへのアクセスを許可するようにサイトがユーザーに確認を求めることを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1266">AskWebBluetooth (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a nearby Bluetooth device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1267">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1267">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1268">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1268">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1269">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1269">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1270">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1270">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1271">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1271">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1272">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1272">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1273">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1273">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1274">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1274">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1275">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1275">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1276">GP 固有の名前: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1276">GP unique name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1277">GP 名: Web Bluetooth API の使用を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1277">GP name: Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1278">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1278">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1279">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1279">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1280">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1280">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1281">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1281">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1282">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1282">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1283">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1283">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1284">値の名前: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1284">Value Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1285">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1285">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1286">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1286">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1287">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1287">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1288">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1288">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1289">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1289">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1290">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1290">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1291">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1291">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1292">WebUSB API の使用を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1292">Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1293">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1293">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1294">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1294">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1295">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1295">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1296">Web サイトが接続されている USB デバイスにアクセスできるかどうかを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1296">Set whether websites can access connected USB devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1297">アクセスを完全にブロックするか、Web サイトが接続されている USB デバイスにアクセスするときに毎回ユーザーに確認を求めるように設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1297">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to connected USB devices.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1298">特定の URL パターンに対するこのポリシーは、[WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) と [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) ポリシーを使用して、上書きすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1298">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) and [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1299">このポリシーを構成していない場合、サイトは既定で接続された USB デバイス ('AskWebUsb') にアクセス可能かどうかをユーザーに確認することができ、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1299">If you don't configure this policy, sites can ask users whether they can access the connected USB devices ('AskWebUsb') by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1300">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1300">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1301">BlockWebUsb (2) = WebUSB API を介して USB デバイスへのアクセスを要求するサイトを許可しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1301">BlockWebUsb (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to USB devices via the WebUSB API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1302">AskWebUsb (3) = 接続されている USB デバイスへのアクセスを許可するようにサイトがユーザーに確認を求めることを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1302">AskWebUsb (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a connected USB device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1303">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1303">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1304">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1304">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1305">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1305">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1306">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1306">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1307">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1307">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1308">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1308">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1309">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1309">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1310">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1310">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1311">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1311">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1312">GP 固有の名前: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1312">GP unique name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1313">GP 名: WebUSB API の使用を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1313">GP name: Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1314">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1314">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1315">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1315">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1316">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1316">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1317">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1317">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1318">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1318">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1319">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1319">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1320">値の名前: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1320">Value Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1321">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1321">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1322">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1322">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1323">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1323">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1324">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1324">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1325">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1325">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1326">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1326">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1327">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1327">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1328">これらのサイトでの画像の使用を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1328">Allow images on these sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1329">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1329">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1330">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1330">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1331">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1331">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1332">画像を表示することができるサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1332">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1333">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) のいずれかからのグローバルな既定値が、すべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1333">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value is used for all sites either from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1334">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1334">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1335">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1335">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1336">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1336">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1337">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1337">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1338">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1338">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1339">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1339">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1340">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1340">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1341">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1341">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1342">GP 固有の名前: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1342">GP unique name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1343">GP 名: これらのサイトでの画像の使用を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1343">GP name: Allow images on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1344">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1344">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1345">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1345">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1346">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1346">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1347">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1347">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1348">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1348">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1349">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1349">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1350">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1350">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1351">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1351">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1352">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1352">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1353">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1353">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1354">基本設定キーの名前: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1354">Preference Key Name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1355">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1355">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1356">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1356">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1357">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1357">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1358">特定のサイトでの 画像 のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1358">Block images on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1359">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1359">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1360">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1360">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1361">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1361">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1362">画像の表示が許可されていないサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1362">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1363">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1363">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1364">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1364">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1365">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1365">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1366">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1366">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1367">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1367">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1368">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1368">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1369">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1369">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1370">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1370">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1371">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1371">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1372">GP 固有の名前: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1372">GP unique name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1373">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの 画像 のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1373">GP name: Block images on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1374">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1374">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1375">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1375">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1376">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1376">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1377">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1377">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1378">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1378">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1379">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1379">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1380">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1380">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1381">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1381">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1382">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1382">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1383">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1383">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1384">基本設定キーの名前: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1384">Preference Key Name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1385">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1385">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1386">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1386">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1387">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1387">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1388">特定のサイトでの安全でないコンテンツの使用を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1388">Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1389">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1389">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1390">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1390">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1391">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1391">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1392">安全でない混在するコンテンツ（つまり、HTTPS サイトにある HTTP コンテンツ）を表示できるサイトを指定するための URL パターンの一覧を作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1392">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that can display insecure mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1393">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ブロック可能な混在するコンテンツがブロックされ、オプションでブロック可能な混在するコンテンツがアップグレードされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1393">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1394">ただし、ユーザーは特定のサイトで安全でない混在するコンテンツを許可する例外を設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1394">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1395">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1395">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1396">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1396">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1397">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1397">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1398">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1398">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1399">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1399">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1400">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1400">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1401">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1401">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1402">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1402">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1403">GP 固有の名前: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1403">GP unique name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1404">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの安全でないコンテンツの使用を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1404">GP name: Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1405">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1405">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1406">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1406">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1407">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1407">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1408">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1408">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1409">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1409">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1410">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1410">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1411">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1411">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1412">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1412">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1413">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1413">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\1 = https://www.example.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\2 = [*.]example.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1414">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1414">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1415">基本設定キーの名前: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1415">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1416">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1416">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1417">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1417">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1418">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1418">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1419">特定のサイトでの安全でないコンテンツのブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1419">Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1420">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1420">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1421">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1421">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1422">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1422">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1423">URL パターンの一覧を作成して、ブロック可能な (つまりアクティブな) 混在するコンテンツ (つまり、HTTPS サイトにある HTTP コンテンツ) の表示を許可しないサイトと、オプションでブロック可能な混在するコンテンツのアップグレードを無効にするサイトを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1423">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that aren't allowed to display blockable (i.e. active) mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites) and for which optionally blockable mixed content upgrades will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1424">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ブロック可能な混在するコンテンツがブロックされ、オプションでブロック可能な混在するコンテンツがアップグレードされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1424">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1425">ただし、ユーザーは特定のサイトで安全でない混在するコンテンツを許可する例外を設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1425">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1426">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1426">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1427">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1427">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1428">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1428">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1429">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1429">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1430">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1430">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1431">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1431">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1432">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1432">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1433">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1433">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1434">GP 固有の名前: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1434">GP unique name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1435">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの安全でないコンテンツのブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1435">GP name: Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1436">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1436">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1437">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1437">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1438">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1438">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1439">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1439">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1440">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1440">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1441">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1441">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1442">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1442">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1443">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1443">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1444">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1444">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\1 = https://www.example.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\2 = [*.]example.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1445">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1445">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1446">基本設定キーの名前: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1446">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1447">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1447">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1448">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1448">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1449">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1449">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1450">特定のサイトでの JavaScript を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1450">Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1451">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1451">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1452">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1452">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1453">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1453">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1454">JavaScript の実行が許可されているサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1454">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1455">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1455">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1456">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1456">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1457">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1457">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1458">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1458">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1459">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1459">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1460">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1460">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1461">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1461">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1462">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1462">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1463">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1463">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1464">GP 固有の名前: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1464">GP unique name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1465">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの JavaScript を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1465">GP name: Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1466">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1466">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1467">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1467">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1468">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1468">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1469">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1469">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1470">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1470">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1471">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1471">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1472">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1472">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1473">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1473">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1474">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1474">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1475">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1475">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1476">基本設定キーの名前: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1476">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1477">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1477">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1478">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1478">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1479">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1479">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1480">特定のサイトでの JavaScript のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1480">Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1481">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1481">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1482">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1482">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1483">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1483">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1484">JavaScript の実行が許可されていないサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1484">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1485">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1485">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1486">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1486">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1487">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1487">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1488">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1488">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1489">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1489">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1490">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1490">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1491">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1491">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1492">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1492">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1493">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1493">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1494">GP 固有の名前: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1494">GP unique name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1495">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの JavaScript のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1495">GP name: Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1496">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1496">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1497">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1497">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1498">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1498">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1499">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1499">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1500">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1500">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1501">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1501">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1502">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1502">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1503">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1503">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1504">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1504">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1505">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1505">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1506">基本設定キーの名前: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1506">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1507">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1507">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1508">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1508">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1509">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1509">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1510">既定のレガシ SameSite Cookie の動作設定を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1510">Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1511">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1511">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1512">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1512">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1513">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1513">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1514">すべての Cookie をレガシ SameSite の動作に戻します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1514">Lets you revert all cookies to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1515">レガシ動作に戻すと、SameSite 属性を指定していない Cookie は "SameSite=None" であるかのように扱われ、"SameSite=None" Cookie に "Secure" 属性を付与する必要がなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1515">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", and removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1516">このポリシーを設定していない場合、SameSite 属性を指定しない Cookie の既定の動作は、SameSite-by-default 機能のその他の構成ソースに依存します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1516">If you don't set this policy, the default behavior for cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute will depend on other configuration sources for the SameSite-by-default feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1517">この機能は、フィールド トライアルで設定するか、または edge://flags で same-site-by-default-cookies フラグを有効にすることで設定することができる可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1517">This feature might be set by a field trial or by enabling the same-site-by-default-cookies flag in edge://flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1518">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1518">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1519">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = すべてのサイトの Cookie をレガシ SameSite の動作に戻す。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1519">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1520">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = すべてのサイトの Cookie に、SameSite-by-default の動作を使用する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1520">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = Use SameSite-by-default behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="215ac-1521">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1521">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1522">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1522">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1523">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1523">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1524">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1524">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1525">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1525">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1526">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1526">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1527">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1527">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1528">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1528">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1529">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1529">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1530">GP 固有の名前: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1530">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1531">GP 名: 既定のレガシ SameSite Cookie の動作設定を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1531">GP name: Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1532">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1532">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1533">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1533">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1534">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1534">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1535">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1535">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1536">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1536">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1537">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1537">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1538">値の名前: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1538">Value Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1539">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1539">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1540">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1540">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1541">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1541">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1542">基本設定キーの名前: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1542">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="215ac-1543">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="215ac-1543">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
